introduction: SYNOPSISMi-hi had a failed affair with a foreign English conversation teacher. After being distraught for a while, Mi-hi transforms herself to be known as 'Queen Bee' at Itaewon district. On the other hand, Mi-hi's first love, Kyung-su, tries to rescue her from her corrupt life at Itaewon but Mi-hi turns him down. As if repenting for her past mistakes, Mi-hi takes care of the Itaewon women. Mi-hi's sister, Jung-hi, shows up with a foreigner named Steve. Mi-hi knows the truth about Steve and she tries to persuade her sister but it's no use. In order to protect her sister and as a warning to other women who nurture ridiculous illusion about foreign men, Mi-hi seduces Steve and has her revenge on him.故事三木爱用的外国人谁是失败告终的英语老师被转换成与绰号女王蜂在梨泰院徘徊的女子。同时，一个男人，初恋三木的水正在抢救的三木三木梨泰院，但被拒绝。至于赎他生命无效，出现在与姐妹梨泰院前的Carissa三木保护妇女和外国人史蒂夫梨泰院的生活。三木知道史蒂夫的身份即将进行说服他的弟弟，但被指控的Carissa。为了敲响警钟妇女和捍卫他的弟弟是ilnyeom与白日梦的外国人三木有多个勾引史蒂夫。
